plasma.medium.name.title: Plasma medium
plasma.medium.name.description: medium name the plasma source is operated in. E.g. Ar, CO2 , H2O, air

plasma.medium.properties.title: Properties
plasma.medium.properties.description: properties of the medium the plasma source is operated in. E.g. gas flow rate: 100 sccm, carrier gas: Ar, precursor: HMDSO, gas mixture: Ar with 10 ppm HMDSO

plasma.medium.procedure.title: Procedure
plasma.medium.procedure.description: procedure to prepare the medium. E.g. gas flow has to be established for at least 30 s before plasma ignition
